name: Encore ENLWI-N3 802.11a/b/g/n PCI Wi-Fi Adapter
Security:
64/128-bit WEP Encryption
WPA, WPA2, WPS and 802.1x advanced security
Operating Range: Indoor: Up to 100m, Outdoor: Up to 300m
Features: [Interface: 32-bit PCI v2.2, Bandwidth: 20MHz / 40MHz, Media Access Protocol: CSMA/CA with ACK, QoS: WMM and WMM-PS, Working Mode: Infrastructure, Ad-Hoc.]
